label: ABC_tP6_129_a_c_b-001
title: LaOF Structure
comments: The general formula for this compound is XO$_{x}$F$_{3-2x}$.  For $x \le 1$ the structure is \href{current_web_home_dir/ABC_tP6_129_a_c_b-001}{tetragonal (LaOF prototype)}, and when $x > 1$ it is \href{current_web_home_dir/ABC_hR6_166_c_c_c-002}{rhombohedral (YOF prototype)}.  At high temperatures these structures transform into the cubic \href{current_web_home_dir/AB2_cF12_225_a_c-001}{fluorite ($C1$) structure}, with the anions statistically distributed over the (2c) sites. (Zachariasen, 1951; Petzel, 1993)
